title: Curse
text:
A model suffering the curse condition :

- y Cannot harvest Souls in any way. If a cursed model kills an enemy model, then the dead model's Soul does not spawn at all; the model is simply removed.

- y Cannot contest or control Shrines.

- y Cannot Assist friendly models, or Hinder enemy models, that attempt a Soul Harvest .

- y Cannot Bank a Soul for killing Undead.

- y Cannot have Souls Bound to them.

Note: If a model has a Soul Bound to it and then becomes cursed, it does not lose that Soul.

Unbound Souls do not move towards Heroes suffering the curse condition during the Communion Phase.
